plot: Being chased by a giant monster, a little girl embarks on a journey by train from London Bridge up to Hastings. During this adventure, she will discover the extraordinary charm of the south coast of England.
title: London to Hastings
plot_es: Being chased by a giant monster, a little girl embarks on a journey by train from London Bridge up to Hastings. During this adventure, she will discover the extraordinary charm of the south coast of England.
